<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 610, 289, 641]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[178, 646, 524, 662]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[178, 667, 644, 684]]<|/det|>
- decelerating at a constant rate with the parachute open,

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[178, 688, 621, 706]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[178, 710, 626, 727]]<|/det|>
